// Test-only fake secrets to trigger Secret Scanning Alerts (do NOT use in production)

# GitHub token (fake)
GITHUB_TOKEN=ghp_test_FAKE_TOKEN_abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz1234

# AWS (fake)
AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=AKIAFAKEEXAMPLE
AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=FAKEwJalrXUtnFEMIEXAMPLEKEY

# Azure (fake)
AZURE_CLIENT_SECRET=azure_fake_client_secret_0123456789

# Slack webhook (fake)
SLACK_WEBHOOK=https://hooks.slack.com/services/T00000000/B00000000/XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

# Stripe (fake)
STRIPE_SECRET=sk_test_FAKE_4eC39HqLyjWDarjtT1zdp7dc

mysql_connection_string=server=localhost;uid=TEST_USER;pwd=TEST_PASSWORD;database=test_db;port=3307

# Generic private key block (fake)
PRIVATE_KEY=-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----
MIIBPAIBAAJBFAKEEXAMPLEKEYDATA...
-----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----
